channel.title: Musical accompaniment
channel.description: I know, black mesa team have a nice composers, producers and musicians. But i'm very very loving HL series. And i want to make some deposit of my efforts in this project. In my oppinion, black mesa is the most strong and promising project of all of i could seen. So, my question is: [u]Can you let me make some soundtrack for black mesa source?[/u]:zip: Here is some of my created previews [url='https://myfreefilehosting.com/f/05f5082546_0.25MB']https://myfreefilehosting.com/f/05f5082546_0.25MB[/url] [url='https://myfreefilehosting.com/f/b45311c063_0.46MB']https://myfreefilehosting.com/f/b45311c063_0.46MB[/url] Ps: I couldn't find the words "contact us" on web site of Black mesa, and i decided to write here. Sorry for bad english.

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: Edfake
item.description:
It would be nice to listen to this, however, the links are expired, any chance of re-putting them up?

Read full topic

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: Deepthroat
item.description:
Like everyone else said.

Though the previews you gave are boomboxing. You could always make the soundtrack to my life, or at least the soundtrack to me playing Black Mesa: Source.

Read full topic

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness
item.description:
The soundtrack for Black Mesa have already gone gold, so you are a bit too late.

Read full topic

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: Calebmcghee
item.description:
Sounds pretty good, but they are too late in development to take it. I’m sure there a lot of other mods that would be glad for your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
You could always mod the game and replace the music with your own.

Read full topic

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: Brockley
item.description:
Sounds good to me, but as was already said, black mesa already has a composer and besides, its a little late in the game to ask if you can be apart of the mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
Black Mesa already has a talented composer, Joel Nielsen, that is doing the sound track and audio for the game. At this stage I would assume that most of the sound work is complete, but thanks for your interest anyway. Here is Joel’s website:

https://www.joelnielsen.com/

Read full topic

item.title: Musical accompaniment
item.dc:creator: adwardspiral
item.description:
I know, black mesa team have a nice composers, producers and musicians. But i’m very very loving HL series. And i want to make some deposit of my efforts in this project.
In my oppinion, black mesa is the most strong and promising project of all of i could seen.
So, my question is: Can you let me make some soundtrack for black mesa source?:zip:
Here is some of my created previews
https://myfreefilehosting.com/f/05f5082546_0.25MB
https://myfreefilehosting.com/f/b45311c063_0.46MB
Ps: I couldn’t find the words “contact us” on web site of Black mesa, and i decided to write here.
Sorry for bad english.

Read full topic
